name: Brahmic Towers (of Hanoi)
description:
Play Towers of Hanoi in several game modes!

Game Modes:

  • Basic - the standard Towers of Hanoi game. Bring all the disks in the designated stack in order by decreasing size from the top.
  • Twin - bring the two colours of disks to their designated coloured stack.
  • Special - same mechanics as Twin mode but with a twist. There will be a third group of disks. This disks can be used with powerups and use it to your advantage.

Credits:

SFX by Lokif at opengameart.org

Music, The Chase by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.
